title: Owen Lentz
text:
Owen Lentz (born 24 January 1980) is a former South African-born American <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played for <a href="Maryland%20Exiles">Maryland Exiles</a> and gained 8 caps since his debut in 2006 for the <a href="United%20States%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">American national side</a>. Lentz played as a hooker or occasionally as flanker.
Lentz represented South Africa at under-21 level before switching allegiance to the US.
